show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today we have a conversation with Richard Becker, the Western Region Coordinator of the ANSWER Coalition, (Act Now to… Stop War and End Racism) We will address the question—Who are the  Global One-Percent Ruling Class and how do they maintain power in the world?
At the bottom of the hour we will hear from Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio.
Then We will have a live update from Michael Levitin with the Occupy Caravan on the road in Alabama.
We end up with an in-studio discussion:  Is NATO moving towards military action against Syria?
